title: Ep. 582 - The Will To Survive
description:
Kanye’s back in the presidential race, Trump gives conservatives a lesson on political power, and churches burn around the West.

Ben's new book "How to Destroy America in Three Easy Steps" is coming out July 21st. Get your signed copy here => https://utm.io/uGvC
